Name /Title: Verify user cannot send an empty message
Steps to be Executed:
1- Open the Facebook mobile application
2- Login
3- Click on the Messenger icon            
4- Click on "New Message" icon
5-Write Name of facebook user  
6-Try to send message
Expected Results: Unable to click the Send icon
Actual Result: Unable to click the Send icon

Name /Title: Verify user cannot send a message without internet connection
Steps to be Executed:
1- Open the Facebook mobile application
2- Login
3- Click on the Messenger icon            
4- Click on "New Message" icon
5-Write Name of facebook user   
6-Send message
Expected Results: A blue circle should appear on the right side of the message.
Actual Result: A blue circle should appear on the right side of the message.
